docs.snippet: Seattle’s rookie quarterback Russell Wilson emerged from last Sunday’s playoff loss with his reputation enhanced....
docs.lead_paragraph: Seattle’s rookie quarterback Russell Wilson emerged from last Sunday’s playoff loss with his reputation enhanced.
docs.abstract: Keeping Score column; Seattle Seahawks rookie quarterback Russell Wilson cemented his star status by playing well in post-season loss to Atlanta Falcons; Wilson became the seventh quarterback to throw for 300 yards and rush for 50 in a playoff game,  nearly completing the biggest fourth-quarter comeback in NFL playoff history.

headline.seo: Russell Wilson, Seattle Rookie Quarterback, Wins by Losing
